sequenceDiagram
    participant M as ðŸ›ï¸ Merchant
    participant PG as ðŸ”— Gateway
    participant ACQ as ðŸ¦ Acquirer
    participant CN as ðŸŒ Network
    participant ISS as ðŸ’³ Issuer
    participant LOG as ðŸ“œ Logger
    participant NOTI as ðŸ“¢ Notification
    participant P as ðŸ‘¤ Payer

    M->>PG: Send reversal request
    PG->>ACQ: Forward reversal
    ACQ->>CN: Forward reversal
    CN->>ISS: Forward reversal

    ISS->>ISS: Release held funds
    ISS->>LOG: Log reversal event
    LOG->>NOTI: Trigger reversal notification
    NOTI-->>P: Funds released (Authorization Reversed)
